author: CBR
description:
In the third episode of CBR's Heroes Journey Podcast, our hosts Sean O'Connell and Sierra Nutkevitch discuss the Warner Bros Discovery sale and what a split or new owner could mean for James Gunn's DCU, DC Studios, theaters, and streaming. 

We also discuss Gen V Season 2 and how it leads into The Boys Season 5, as well as a fun idea for introducing a live-action Miles Morales.

Jump in, share your take, and tell us where you’d like to see DC land next!

Chapters
00:00 – WB Discovery sale: what it means for DC Studios
07:55 – Potential buyers
12:25 – DC’s future pipeline: budget, distribution, and reach
18:03 – Gen V S2 heading into The Boys S5
29:25 – The Boys Season 5 expectations
40:15 – Miles Morales "beyond animation" idea

🎙️This is Episode 3 of CBR’s weekly Heroes Journey Podcast, dropping every Saturday!

Watch more Heroes Journey Podcast episodes here → https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfpipp6KbWs4apsUf5fIcxVw1cpaXXWxg

#DCU #JamesGunn #WarnerBros #DC #TheBoys #GenV

--
title: Could Your DC Favorites Disappear? Warner Bros. Sale Explained | Heroes Journey EP 3
